title: An historical relation of the first discovery of the isle of Madera [sic] written originally in Portugueze by Don Francisco Alcafarado, who was one of the first discoverers, thence translated into French, and now made English.
author: Alcoforado, Francisco.
notes: This work in the form represented by the translation is by some attributed to F.M. de Mello, the owner of Alcoforado's MS.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
